Name: Black Academy
About the game: “The school’s like hell... It’s actually run by devils?!” Black Academy. An institution that forces its students to work. Unfair treatment by seniors, overtime every day. On top of that, teachers have private errands for students! The students were inspired by the magical world and became magical girls. Will they put an end to the devils’ plan and clock out? ✦ Side-scrolling shooter + roguelite In Black Academy, collect various spells on different maps and level up in order to slay devils! Exciting horizontal shooter & roguelite game ✦ Unique attacks by the magical girls! Explore the maps to get various spells. Choose a spell that matches your play style. ✦ Magical spells get stronger and stronger! Get power-up items to change magical spells into different shapes and forms. Find new magical spells and check out how they level up. ✦ Cute magical world residents! Each resident has a story and came into the devils’ barrier. They’re a bit stubborn, but they’ll help you clock out. ✦ Blame the overtime on the powerful devils! Devils live by consuming the dark emotions created by work. They try to use the most powerful stress to rule the world. Get the devils’ attacks under control and step closer to clocking out.
